channel.title: Large Language Models on RJChow's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Large Language Models on RJChow's Notes

item.title: LLM Explainer
item.description: There’s been quite a few articles that’s been written about AI all over the internet, with various technical depths and contexts. But I find that there’s a opportunity here to provide an explainer without specialist ML/AI/Statistics background knowledge and jargon.
